welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Smithfield, a charming and picturesque town known for its scenic beauty and historic landmarks. Get ready to discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for major airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport houses ticket counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at T. F. Green Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at T. F. Green Airport serves domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Worcester Regional Airport handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car counters.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Worcester Regional Airport serves private and charter flights and offers a comfortable lounge for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
